TopicTitle: [WIP][1.6.x_TEMPORARY FIX] NAS - Naval Artillery System 0.7.0 (BDAc Addon, WW2 Naval Weapons) - "Land of Dragon" - 2018/4/28

Articles.Content: This pack now includes a 5" dual-purpose gun, which matches Maritime Pack size. More small guns are in process.

I had an idea that might add a cool dimension. I'm building a heavy cruiser, and it is lacking close in AA firepower.

So I though 40mm gun tubs or something similar would be very cool and handy, though the polys for the 3d model might end up being a bit excessive...

Also, giving 5" guns airburst/flak capability
How,about some varying levels of bofors?

I had an idea that might add a cool dimension. I'm building a heavy cruiser, and it is lacking close in AA firepower.

So I though 40mm gun tubs or something similar would be very cool and handy, though the polys for the 3d model might end up being a bit excessive...

Also, giving 5" guns airburst/flak capability

It has been decided that AA guns will be in the next major update.

caliber is how long the barrel is as opposed to the diameter of the gun.

Technically caliber is a measurement of barrel length in lengths equal to the diameter of the projectile.

EG, the 5"/38 caliber gun barrel is 190 inches long, whereas the 16"/51 caliber gun barrels of the Iowas were 816 inches (68 feet) long
